name: Advocacy Strategies AG
legal: Limited liability company under Swiss law
goal: Providing clients with advice in the area of public relations, public affairs, reputation building and stakeholder engagement at EU level and in several countries. Helping to improve mutual understanding and information flow between political decision-makers and enterprises.
interests: Energy, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Energy Union
- Energy policy and legislation
- Infrastructure in the Baltic region
